name: Connect 4 Xtreme
description:
Connect 4 Xtreme is a classic connect four board game with added power-ups to spice up the gameplay.

Power-ups includes destroying or switching colours of surrounding, vertical, horizontal, and diagonal pieces.

Submission for Extra Credits Game Jam #4

Credits:

Developed by Lei

(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/connect-four-starter-kit-19722)
